= Source Code Repository Structure =

The [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion] repository for the !DelphiDabbler Component and Unit Library is structured as follows:

|| <pre>branches</pre> || Unused at present. ||
|| <pre>tags</pre> || Contains copies of all stable releases. ||
|| <pre>  lib</pre> || Unused at present. Reserved for any releases of whole library. Each release will have its own sub-directory. ||
|| <pre>  projects</pre> || Contains stable releases of each sub-project. ||
|| <pre>    proj-id</pre> || Contains stable releases of a sub-project. There is one such directory for each sub-project. The directory name is the ID of the sub-project. ||
|| <pre>      release-x.x.x</pre> || Contains a stable release of the sub-project. There is one such directory for each release. x.x.x is replaced by the release version number. ||
|| <pre>      ...</pre> ||  ||
|| <pre>    ...</pre> ||  ||
|| <pre>trunk</pre> || Main development tree. Contains the current development code. It is not guaranteed to be stable, but contains the latest updates. ||
|| <pre>  common</pre> || Contains files common to more than one project. ||
|| <pre>  lib</pre> || Unused at present. Reserved for any development code and documents relating to the whole library. ||
|| <pre>  projects</pre> || Development tree for sub-projects. ||
|| <pre>    proj-id</pre> || Development tree for a sub-project. There is one such directory for each sub-project. The directory name is the ID of the sub-project. ||
|| <pre>    ...</pre> ||  ||
|| <pre>wiki</pre> || Contains the documents that make up the library's Wiki on Google Code. ||
